entities.name: arry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a 14-year-old boy who has an old scar on his forehead. He is described as laying flat on his back, breathing hard, and having a vivid dream.

entities.name: the old scar
entities.description: A bolt-shaped lightning scar on Harry's forehead that is burning beneath his fingers. It is still painful for him.

relationships.description: Harry has an injury, which is the old scar on his forehead that is burning beneath his fingers.
